Mindful Practices: Course 2
SEL Competencies and Experiential Practices

CASEL's First Three Competencies

Now we’ll take some time to explore CASEL’s first three SEL competencies through experiential practices designed for students and adults to integrate into the classroom.

  1. Step 1

    Save a copy of the SEL Note Planning Journal

  2. Step 2

    The following three pages include examples of experiential practice activities. As you explore these activities, use the SEL Note Planning Journal to jot down any you want to try in your classroom. Be sure to complete all the questions in the spreadsheet as well. You will use this information to write a discussion board post at the end of this section.

  3. Step 3

    At the end of this section, you'll be asked to write a discussion board post about an activity you would try in your classroom and how you would modify that activity for your students.

    You will not be required to submit your SEL Note Planning Journal. That document is a reference for your discussion board post and personal classroom use.
